title: Project Setup
description: Initialize the project structure using basic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Create folders for assets (images, CSS, JS) and pages if needed.
acceptance_criteria: Project root contains index.html, /css, /js, and /images directories
Basic HTML boilerplate is set up in index.html
All assets and scripts are correctly linked

title: Design Planning
description: Design layout and visual hierarchy based on provided color palette, typography, and modern minimalistic style.
acceptance_criteria: Figma or wireframe mockup created for all sections
Color palette (#222222, #ffffff, #007acc, #f5f5f5) applied consistently
Fonts Poppins and Roboto imported via Google Fonts
Consistent spacing, clean layout, and clear visual hierarchy established

title: Navigation Bar Implementation
description: Create a responsive navigation bar with links to Home, About, Projects, and Contact sections. Implement smooth scrolling behavior.
acceptance_criteria: Navigation links scroll smoothly to their respective sections
Navbar remains visible and styled consistently across all viewports
Active section highlighting implemented

title: Hero Section Development
description: Implement a hero section introducing the individual with a name, tagline, and call-to-action button.
acceptance_criteria: Displays headline, subheadline, and CTA button
CTA smoothly scrolls to Projects section
Content centered vertically and horizontally with modern layout

title: About Section Development
description: Build the About section containing a professional bio and a list of key skills.
acceptance_criteria: Includes short bio paragraph and skills list styled with icons or badges
Responsive layout for mobile and desktop
Readability and consistent typography maintained

title: Projects Section Development
description: Develop a gallery of featured projects with titles, descriptions, and links to demos or repositories.
acceptance_criteria: Grid or card layout displays all project entries
Hover effects reveal additional project info or actions
Links open in new tabs and are accessible
Consistent spacing and alignment across items

title: Contact Section Development
description: Implement a contact form with name, email, and message fields. Include validation and email integration using EmailJS or similar.
acceptance_criteria: Form fields include placeholders and validation (required fields, email format)
Form submission triggers EmailJS or a mock handler
Success and error messages displayed to the user
Social media links added below form

title: Responsive Design Implementation
description: Enhance all sections for responsiveness across mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.
acceptance_criteria: All layouts adjust gracefully to viewport width changes
Navigation collapses or adapts on small screens
Images and text scale without breaking layout

title: Smooth Scrolling and Interaction Enhancements
description: Add smooth scrolling, hover transitions, and button animations for better user experience.
acceptance_criteria: Smooth scroll behavior added via CSS or JS
Hover and focus states defined for interactive elements
Subtle animations improve UX without performance issues

title: SEO Optimization
description: Add proper metadata, headings, and alt text for SEO-friendly structure.
acceptance_criteria: Each page/section has appropriate <title>, meta description, and keywords
Images include alt attributes
Semantic HTML5 tags (header, main, section, footer) used correctly

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Test website functionality, responsiveness, and accessibility across browsers and devices.
acceptance_criteria: All links and anchors function correctly
Form validations work as intended
Layout consistent in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and mobile browsers
Accessibility audit passes basic WCAG checks

title: Deployment Setup
description: Deploy the site to Vercel, Netlify, or GitHub Pages.
acceptance_criteria: Build folder or static site hosted on chosen platform
Deployment URL accessible publicly
Basic CI/CD or auto-deploy configured via Git

title: Documentation and Maintenance
description: Create a README file documenting project setup, folder structure, and deployment instructions.
acceptance_criteria: README includes project overview, tech stack, and setup steps
Version control with clear commit messages
Future maintenance steps (content updates, bug fixes) outlined
